title: Rosie's Quest
description: When Rosie opens the classroom door she steps into the past. It is Dublin, 1956. She is no longer herself, but Aunt Rose aged eleven, Mum's twin sister. The past is a different world with different rules. How can Rosie deal with the vicious Miss Hackett and her horrible lessons? How can she change events so that Mum and Aunt Rose are not split up forever?
author: Ann Carroll
